issue.title: [C++] Move csv::ReadOptions::skip_rows to csv::ParseOptions::skip_rows
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12002](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12002). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This properly affects how the CSV is parsed and in turn the schema and data, so it belongs in ParseOptions. This means it can also be configured in Datasets.

For now, we'll duplicate the field and deprecate the original spot.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12002?focusedCommentId=17304163) by David Li (lidavidm):*
On further reflection this would be a good deal of churn for not much of an improvement, so cancelling this.
